Security Control: Summarization of new and resolved incidents, SLA & compliance indicators, optional severities
Description: Presentation of data related to incidents development and statistical analysis as entry points for further analysis. Indicators if contractual obligations were met

Security Control: Review of important indicators describing the IM reference model
Description: Presentation of data related to the Reference Model namely avg duration and transition times. Occasionally explanations of specific activity transitions

Security Control: Review of common variants in the given review window
Description: Highlight the most frequent recorded variants. Explain their narrative in the context of the reference model. Optional, highlight uncommon and rarely seen variants and provide explanation or initiate discussion

Security Control: Review of compliance metric averages per activity
Description: Identify the process compliance impeding activities with a given compliance metric and discuss possible means for future implementation against non-compliance. Optional, analysis of temporal development of compliance
Identify the process efficiency impeding activities through the average activity durations and discuss possible means for future reduction in activity durations.

Security Control: Deep dive into most-critical non-compliant incidents
Description: Explain the risks resulting from non-compliance. Possibly resolve non-compliance through the activity specifics and the drift between theoretical and practical process.

Security Control: Report Technical Analysis and most affected categories
Description: Report technical statistics related to occuring symptoms, affected categories and locations to deduce frequently targeted IT assets and infrastructures
